Compatible with iOS 9, 10 and 11

ColoredVK 2 is a tweak which help you to customise your VKApp client. Customise everything from menu to messages! Customise whatever you want and how you want!

Requires with VK App 2.2 and higher.

Note: to download licence you have to have stable internet connection.Otherwise, tweak will NOT work.

If something goes wrong in tweak, write me, don't be afraidüòâ

Configure options from Settings
